---
title: Seagate Construction
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: seagate_construction
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Seagate Construction. The average
  contract duration was 0.94 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $680.6K. The longest
  contract was 2.38 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.7M.
lookup_name: 'SEAGATE CONSTRUCTION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '92%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '24%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.58'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.94'
s421_mean_contract_value: '680.6K'
s425_max_duration: '2.38'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.7M'
---
